entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 3:00 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
